    • putText

      public static String putText(String s, boolean error, boolean cleanAll)
      Give the text to insert in the Menu createMenu() The text could be red if it is an error and can replace all the text already present or continue below
      Parameters:
      s - the text to insert in the menu
      error - if the text is an error message
      cleanAll - if the menu text has to be cleared
      Returns:
      the String to print
